title: RSVP International Kitchen Collection Multi-Function Zester/Grater, Airtight and Leak Proof Container, Dishwasher Safe, 6 oz Capacity, Yellow
features: THE PERFECT SIZE: Measures 3.5" in diameter and is 3.25" tall; Clear cup measures up to 0.75 of a cup (6 oz. or 177mL) in capacity
THE KITCHEN GADGET YOU NEED: This multipurpose tool is ideal for zesting, grating, slicing, and measuring; Container is airtight and leakproof
FUNCTIONAL DESIGN: The handy built-in yellow mini cutting board is perfect for slicing and doubles as the lid or base; Helps you measure as you grate
QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Constructed of high-quality plastic and stainless steel; BPA-free
description: RSVP strives to offer quality kitchen products and cooking tools at competitive prices. Our Citrus Keeper and Zester is a perfect example. Slice, zest and store your citrus with the this multi function container. The stainless steel zesting/grater surface lets you zest/grate and measure directly into the clear container. Container features both metric and standard measures up to 0.75 cup, 6-ounces or 177-Milliliters. The yellow lid acts as a small cutting board while the sharp teeth of the grater make zesting a breeze. If you need to store your leftover citrus simply remove the grater disc and place the cut end of your fruit on the textured side of the yellow lid and place the clear container over the top and turn to lock. The airtight lid keeps your cut citrus fresh longer, odor free, and prevents it from drying. Use our grater/zester for all kinds of citrus as well as hard cheeses or chocolate. Measures 3.5 inches in diameter at its widest point (top with lid on) by 3.25 inches tall. Dishwasher safe, BPA free. When all the right people, and ingredients, kitchen tools, and food come together, we call this The Art of Gathering.
